output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to our criteria:
1. Has CMF: Yes - "CMF 11240017" is present, indicating this is electoral material.
2. Refers to candidate: Yes - directly mentions "Marcel Ciolacu" who is a presidential candidate (Position 3 on the ballot).
3. Addresses wide population: Yes - addresses "dragi bihoreni" and is a paid advertisement on Facebook/Instagram.
4. Electoral objective: Yes - explicitly asks people to vote ("vă așteptăm să-l votați") for Marcel Ciolacu on November 24th.
5. Journalism: No - this is clearly campaign material with a direct call to vote.
6. Personal opinion: No - this is a structured campaign message with CMF number and clear electoral intent.
This post clearly constitutes electoral propaganda because: - It has a CMF number - Directly names a presidential candidate - Makes an explicit call to vote for said candidate - Is being promoted after the end of the presidential campaign period - Is targeting a wide audience through paid social media distribution

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This is clearly electoral propaganda as it meets all criteria under Article 36(7): a) Directly refers to candidate Marcel Ciolacu b) Used during campaign period c) Has clear electoral objective with direct call to vote d) Is not journalistic content but campaign material
conclusion.message-for-police: Infomed Pro SRL, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin continuarea propagandei electorale pentru alegerile prezidentiale dupa incheierea perioadei legale de campanie, prin promovarea unei reclame platite pe Facebook (ID: 891258106323887) care indeamna in mod explicit la votarea candidatului Marcel Ciolacu la alegerile prezidentiale din 24 noiembrie ("vă așteptăm să-l votați pe președințele Marcel Ciolacu"). Postarea include numar CMF (11240017), are caracter electoral explicit prin indemnul direct la vot, si este promovata dupa ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, incalcand astfel prevederile legale privind perioada de campanie electorala. Efectul electoral urmarit este influentarea directa a votantilor in favoarea candidatului PSD la presedintie, prin utilizarea resurselor financiare pentru promovarea mesajului electoral in afara perioadei legale de campanie.
